headline: Is Diamondback Energy (FANG) Still Attractively Priced After Recent Shale Sector Headlines
summary: If you are wondering whether Diamondback Energy's share price still reflects good value, or if most of the opportunity is already priced in, this article walks through what the numbers say about the stock today. The shares last closed at US$153.52, with returns of 1.5% over 7 days, 4.9% over 30 days, 0.8% year to date, an 8.0% decline over 1 year, and a 19.8% and very large 5 year gain. Recent news around Diamondback Energy has focused on its position in the US shale sector and how investors...
